2108360.name: World of Shooting: Killhouse Campaign
2108360.description:
The KillHouse Campaign currently offers 45 sets, each consisting of 3 stages, for a total of 135 high-intensity killhouse challenges.

Available Match Types

Each weapon category features its own style of levels and engagement distances:

  • Pistols — indoor hangars, short to medium distances

  • SMGs — hangars and open levels, short to medium distances

  • Assault Rifles — hangars and open levels, short, medium, and long-range engagements

  • Shotguns — open levels, short to medium distances

  • Mixed Matches — currently in testing and balancing; coming soon

Gameplay Rules

KillHouse allows both full-auto and short-burst firing modes, giving players full freedom in how they clear stages.

Unique Features:

Secret Targets — optional hidden targets placed off the main route

Hidden Targets — partially concealed targets requiring precision and awareness

Shooting Bonuses

Players earn extra score for skilled shots:

  • Headshot — precision hit to the head zone

  • Fast Hit — hit a target within 1 second after it appears

  • Double Tap — fire two accurate shots within 0.25 seconds (available only in semi-auto mode)

Penalties are applied for:

  • Reloading while a target is in line of sight

  • Having an empty magazine while a target is in line of sight
